mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( post_id, board_id, user_id, title, content, created_by ) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, board_id, user_id, title, content, view_count, comment_count, created_at FROM post
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_view (user_id, post_id, viewed_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE viewed_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.category_id, b.board_name, b.board_level, b.sort_order, b.recommend_yn, b.created_by, b.created_at, b.updated_by, b.updated_at, c.category_name, c.sort_order AS sort_order_category, c.main_exposure, c.is_notice FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT viewed_at FROM post_view WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY viewed_at DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 15
